ai-patthana23.52:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.52:0.3_0: See the interval between the truths,
ai-patthana23.52:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion regarding what is not given, nor does repulsion come to an end.
ai-patthana23.52:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.52:2.1_0: Not for the sake of non-declining, resenting, and exerting the teaching gives rise to the middle, conditions for the sake of midddling is a cause of midddling.
ai-patthana23.52:2.1_1: This is the reason why the Universal Monarch lack of single intention.
ai-patthana23.52:3.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or repulsion come to an end. The Dhamma is a cause of reason and sublime, because of this.
ai-patthana23.52:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
